attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from the red list
attributes.additional_details: The COVID rates are low and are only decreasing in Pakistan. India which has been moved to the amber list has more than 6 times as many cases than Pakistan yet has still been placed in the amber list. There is no real reason which should prevent Pakistan from being placed on the amber list
attributes.background: Pakistan should be moved to the amber list as it has more than 7 times less cases than India which has been moved to amber list. Loads of Pakistani citizens are stuck there and we would like them to come back

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
